content: this v-neck cap-sleeved raglan t-shirt is crocheted in the round from the top-down it s seamless and the top-down construction allows you to try it on as you go the sweater is designed to be fitted and has a small amount of negative ease therefore finished measurements should be exactly or slightly less than your actual measurements this is a template not a pattern and it allows you freedom as far as gauge and stitch pattern go for more about how this sweater is constructed check out the article about it and to connect with other crocheters who are making it join the crochet-along
